this was set up - it's quite a well known video in czech - they paid the women modelling fees and got their signatures

Movie Reviews: As the long title describes, it is exactly what it is. Its fun, its mean, and it "appears" real. Language is Czech as might be expected and the setting is Prague I believe because of the underground subway scene and license plates on the cars . Although I have never seen or heard of this video before it might be staged because there is a identical custom Mazda 6 in the scenes, either the car the "victim" uses or its parked on the street and oh yeah the car that the two guys use to get around and hunt for chicks. Coincidence? I don't think so. 

Video: 9 out of 10
Sound: 9 out of 10

Verdict: Good but would like to see more, with more action like a fight or chase for the entertainment value, oh and a better ending "victim".
